#summary List of strategies that can be used to solve a Sudoku puzzle
#labels Featured

Our goal is to provide a Java implementation of each [http://www.sudopedia.org/wiki/Solving_technique solving technique] described on the Sudopedia wiki.  The following table shows the currently implemented techniques, with a link to the appropriate wiki page, implementation source, and change log.
